title: Meet InVision Studio
description:
We‚Äôre thrilled to announce InVision Studio, the world‚Äôs most powerful screen design tool‚Äîfeaturing responsive layout, rapid prototyping, advanced animation, shared design systems, and seamless collaboration, all in one place.

We approached InVision Studio with a deep understanding of the art and science of digital product design, insights gained by working closely with the world‚Äôs best design teams and finding inspiration in how they create the world's most beloved digital products.

We crafted every pixel of InVision Studio to answer their needs and harness their power. Now, that power is yours.

This is the design tool we‚Äôve always wanted. We‚Äôre excited to share it with you. Sign up for early access now.

Looking forward to hearing what you think!

title: Wix Playoff: Take the Playground
description:
The web is your playground ‚Äî it's yours for the taking. With Wix.com you have real creative freedom online. That‚Äôs why we‚Äôve teamed up with Dribbble to host the official, Wix Playoff: Take the Playground.

The Contest
Design the word ‚Äúplayground‚Äù in any way you want - animation, GIF, 3D model, illustration and more to win an all-inclusive trip to a design conference of your choice!

How To Enter
1. Like this promo so everyone on Dribbble can enjoy it!
2. Rebound this shot with your ‚Äúplayground‚Äù design
3. Like your favorite shot to vote for the winners.

A great Rebound designs the word ‚Äúplayground.‚Äù

Prizes
Our grand prize winner and two runner-ups will be chosen by a panel of judges from Dribbble and Wix Design. Additionally, 10 honorable mentions will be chosen. Judging criteria will include creativity, originality, and popular vote.

Grand Prize:
All-access pass + flight and hotel to a design conference of your choice
Wix.com 2 year VIP Premium Plan
Dribbble Pro for 1 year

Runner Up:
$1,000 towards digital design products of your choice
Wix.com 2 year VIP Premium Plan
Dribbble Pro for 1 year

Fan Favorite:
Dribbble Store - 1 of everything
Wix.com 2 year VIP Premium Plan
Dribbble Pro for 1 year

Honourable Mentions:
Wix.com 2 year VIP Premium Plan
Dribbble Pro for 1 year

Rules
Rebound this shot by November 21st! And go like your favorite shots. Let‚Äôs play!

Open to participants who reside where this contest is permissible. Click here for the official rules.

comments.body:
Jay Fletcher, ladies and gentlemen. A DesignBot from the future, sent back in time to make us all look bad.

I like all these explorations, Jay, and while I *really* love the shapes and aesthetic of #2 (of the shot), and I naturally seem to gravitate towards that one, I feel like #2 (of the attachment) has the biggest potential for flexibility. I also think that #2 (of the attachment) and #3 (of the shot) cold easily exist in the same family of branding assets.

And finally, no matter which direction you choose for the shapes, the serif typeface of #1 is my pick overall.

Really interested to see how this one evolves.

title: IT'S A GUNDAM!
description:
Needed some more playtime with nerd stuff. Some as-of-yet unreleased typefaces in use here along with Maelstrom and Ogg.

For the halftone, I took a manga image, blew it up to 600 dpi, then made the halftone. The "crunchiness" that comes from upscaling the resolution softens the eventual halftone and the higher resolution makes sure you get the clarity in the dots you want to see.

I'll finish the other half of the type stuff eventually, hah!
